title: Anomaly
description: This entity contains a harmonised description of an anomaly.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be Anomaly

detectedBy.description: Relationship. The ID of the device at which the anomaly was detected

anomalousProperty.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Text'. The controlledProperty (of the device) in which the anomaly was detected

dateDetected.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The date and time at which the anomaly was first detected

thresholdBreach.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Description of an observed threshold breach that contributed to detection of an anomaly

dateObserved.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. A sub-property of the Property 'thresholdBreach'. The date and time at which the threshold breach was observed

measuredValue.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/Number'. A sub-property of the Property 'thresholdBreach'. The value measured for the corresponding device and controlled property

thresholdType.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. A sub-property of the Property 'thresholdBreach'. The type of the threshold that was breached

thresholdValue.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. A sub-property of the Property 'thresholdBreach'. The value of the threshold that was breached
